features: Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Wipes: 9 flip-top packs of 56 unscented diaper wipes (504 total wipes)
Hypoallergenic, dermatologist tested and safe for sensitive skin
No Harsh Ingredients: These Huggies baby wet wipes are free of fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dyes and elemental chlorine
Our simplest formula to help maintain healthy-looking skin: only 7 ingredients including 99% purified water and gentle cleansers
Our Thickest Wipe**: Provides a soft washcloth-like experience ** vs Huggies Natural Care
body.description: Provide your baby with a soft, washcloth-like experience with our thickest wipe*, Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Wipes! These baby diaper wipes have no harsh ingredients and feature Huggies' simplest formula to help maintain healthy skin, with only 7 ingredients including 99% purified water and gentle cleansers. Accepted by the National Eczema Association, these disposable baby wipes are fragrance free, alcohol free and paraben free. Huggies 99% Pure Water Unscented Baby Wipes are also hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested. Each wipe is extra thick and soft, making them ideal for sensitive skin. Huggies’ EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing makes it easy to grab wipes without wasting sheets. Join Huggies Rewards+ powered by Fetch to get rewarded. Earn points on Huggies diapers and wipes, in addition to thousands of other products to redeem for hundreds of gift cards. Download the Fetch Rewards app to get started today! (*vs Huggies Natural Care)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What makes Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Wipes right for you, baby? Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Wipes are not only extra thick and soft, but they are our thickest baby wipe* and provide a washcloth-like experience for you. (*vs Huggies Natural Care) What are Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Wipes made with? Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Wipes are made with our simplest formula with only 7 ingredients, including 99% purified water and gentle cleansers to help maintain healthy skin. You’re learning all about new smells, baby and you may want to know—are these wipes scented? Huggies 99% Pure Water Wipes are hypoallergenic and fragrance free, as well as free of lotions, parabens, alcohol, dyes and elemental chlorine. Are these baby wipes safe for sensitive skin? Yes! Huggies 99% Pure Water Baby Diaper Wipes are dermatologist-tested and accepted by the National Eczema Association. Are these wipes easy to grab one-handed? Parents have their hands full, baby. But don’t worry, our wipes have EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing so it’s easy to grab just one wipe at a time without wasting sheets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wipes out of multiple brands
reviews.reviewText: I've tried out so many brands of wipes to figure out which will be best for my baby. These wipes are super thick so they don't tear. They are perfectly moist and don't get dry at any point in the pack. They also have a design on them, which is cute as well as it gives the wipes texture so it cleans better, grabbing onto the mess, in a way. The lid is a push-button top with a one-handed pull. It truly is one handed, as only one wipe comes out at a time which is super convenient.Comparing these with Huggies Simply Clean:Classic Clean seems to have a soapy residue that gets left on your skin. They also leave little fuzzies on your skin or whatever surface you're wiping. Pure Water does not feel soapy nor does it leave fuzz.Compared to Kirkland Signature Fragrance Free Wipes:Kirkland brand is a close second. They are very strong and thick, but Pure Water is a little thicker and again, the texture picks up messes better. Kirkland is cheaper but the quality is slightly lower. Kirkland wipes have a good one-handed pull, usually giving you one wipe at a time. The lid is flip-top instead of push button as with Pure Water.Compared to Amazon Mama Bear 99% Water Wipes:Amazon brand is just not good. Mama Bear wipes are thin, on the dry side, and they are smooth therefore they slide across the skin and don't clean up messes very well. These wipes are a lot cheaper than Pure Water wipes but the quality isn't good. You get what you pay for with them. These wipes fall short in all the places where Pure Water goes above and beyond.Compared with Pampers Sensitive Wipes:Pampers Sensitive wipes are good quality but one thing I can't stand is they come with the sticker top. It eventually loses its stickiness and the pack is just open, drying out the wipes. There's no such thing as a one-handed pull with these. As for the quality, these wipes also have a pattern with gives them a good gripping texture. They are moist when the pack is closed and they are a nice thickness but not as thick as Pure Water.Overall Huggies Pure Water wipes are the best and I'm willing to pay a little more for this quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t sting like other sensitive wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick, Soft and Moist
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are incredible. I bought ten other brands, and these are the thickest and softest of any wipe I have tried (except for the hospital grade Huggies wipes that aren’t available for retail purchase). The 56 wipe pack of these wipes is taller than most 72 and 80 pack wipes because they are so thick. They don't have any fragrance and they don’t have the strange chemical smell of many fragrance free wipes. I have repurchased 4 times already, these are great for my son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy cleanup with no irritation
reviews.reviewText: Love these wipes. Heavy duty so they clean well with not harsh chemicals that bother gentle skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We are loving these wipes! Thick, absorbent and very moist! The case pops just one wipe at a time which is amazing!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars very good wipes! (but packaging was wrong this time)
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are fantastic! They are soft and not scented! They don't sting and clean well! They don't leave any residue. We really like them!I have ordered a few different times from this same link. They come in 3 boxes of 3 packs(total of 9) inside a bigger box. All is good. This time they came with 9 inside a Huggies original box....but they are NOT flip top. They are the sticker seal closure. The product inside is correct but the packaging is not as stated! I will keep them to use. but I am not pleased that I paid for the described flip top opening and these are not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and fresh for baby’s skin
reviews.reviewText: What I love the most is that these are truly unscented and water based. My babies have very sensitive skin and this is the best I’ve tried so far. I loves this brand as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We received so many different types of wipes at our shower and I kept searching for the perfect ones. I wanted to be comfortable with the ingredients but as all parents know, there are other qualities you want in a good wipe. This checks all the boxes. The opening is unique and so convenient. Only requires one finger to open (push to open top). Much better than water wipes or other wipes with sticky top that collects hair, debris, and dries out. The wipe itself is also thick and big and after using water wipes for the last couple of weeks, this is like a dream come true. Wish we'd known about these sooner. I love them.
